title: performance is getting worse and two tikv oom after running sysbech write-only for a long time
body:
## Bug Report

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
8core„ÄÅ16G memory

### Steps to reproduce
run sysbench oltp_write_only for 12h

### What did you expect?

### What did happened?
performance is getting worse and two tikv oom after 12h
